timeline.bodyText: This is no longer thread safe, I'd revert this to be safe
timeline.author: MattGill98

replies.bodyText: The collection is not being modified, so it doesn't need to create an iterator. All of the for-loop changes were suggested by the IDE.
replies.author: Cousjava

timeline.bodyText: This comment isn't essential, but a lot of these variables use the implementation as the type, when an interface will probably do
timeline.author: MattGill98

timeline.bodyText: This isn't a class variable to it's less important somewhat, but this still isn't thread safe. Whatever we do, I'd update the method so that each of the loops here uses the same convention
